title: Proofpoint On Demand Email Security (Preview)
descriptionMarkdown: Proofpoint On Demand Email Security data connector provides the capability to get Proofpoint on Demand Email Protection data, allows users to check message traceability, monitoring into email activity, threats,and data exfiltration by attackers and malicious insiders. The connector provides ability to review events in your org on an accelerated basis, get event log files in hourly increments for recent activity.

dataTypes.name: ProofpointPOD_message_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
ProofpointPOD_message_CL
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

dataTypes.name: ProofpointPOD_maillog_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
ProofpointPOD_maillog_CL
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
ProofpointPOD_message_CL
      | union ProofpointPOD_maillog_CL 
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(30d)

instructionSteps.description: >**NOTE:** This connector uses Azure Functions to connect to the Proofpoint Websocket API to pull its logs into Azure Sentinel. This might result in additional data ingestion costs. Check the [Azure Functions pricing page](https://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/details/functions/) for details.

>**(Optional Step)** Securely store workspace and API authorization key(s) or token(s) in Azure Key Vault. Azure Key Vault provides a secure mechanism to store and retrieve key values. [Follow these instructions](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/app-service/app-service-key-vault-references) to use Azure Key Vault with an Azure Function App.

**STEP 1 - Configuration steps for the Proofpoint Websocket API**

1. PoD Log API service requires Remote Syslog Forwarding license. Please refer this document on how to enable and check PoD Log API: https://proofpointcommunities.force.com/community/s/article/Proofpoint-on-Demand-Pod-Log-API 
2. You must provide your cluster id and security token.

**STEP 2 - Automated deployment of the connector using an ARM Tempate to deploy the Proofpoint On Demand Email Security data connector and the associated Azure Function**.

Use your **Workspace Id** and **Workspace Key** for deployment.

instructionSteps.title: Azure Resource Manager (ARM) Template
instructionSteps.description:
1. Click the **Deploy to Azure** button below. 

	[![Deploy To Azure](https://aka.ms/deploytoazurebutton)](https://aka.ms/sentinelproofpointpodazuredeploy)
2. Select the preferred **Subscription**, **Resource Group** and **Location**. 
3. Enter the **Workspace ID**, **Workspace Key**, **ProofpointClusterID**, **ProofpointToken** and deploy.
